text: Solanki is one of the important clan group found in the Gujjar community India and Pakistan. In Sindhi and Punjabi, they refer to it as Solangi in the regions of Sindh, South Punjab, and Balochistan. They're mostly Hindu in north Indian states, but some are also Muslim, largely in Pakistani areas.* * ==Origin== They belonged to the Hindu lineage. ==Distributions== They are found in Pakistani provinces like in Sindh, Balochistan and Punjab. But they mainly inhabit in the Indian states of Rajasthan, Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh, Uttar Pradesh, Himachal Pradesh, Uttarakhand, Jammu and Kashmir, Haryana, and Dehli. ==References== ==Further reading== * Smt.
